name: axes
desc: The axes module is used to place 3D axes in the viewer scaled by the model data and/or user defined limits.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Axes Extents
properties.desc: The Axes Extents are used to specify the extents for the axes when Define Extents is selected. Choose "Refresh Extents" to recalculate based on the currently connected view or objects.

properties.name: Round Extents
properties.desc: Round Extents increases the extents of the model to have the labeling start at logical coordinates rounded down at the minimum of x, y, & z and rounded up at the maximum.

properties.name: Offset Factor
properties.desc: Offset Factor is a percentage to offset the extents beyond the data extents.

properties.name: Center Coordinates
properties.desc: The Center Coordinates allow the user to set the actual coordinate to use for each axis center. When linked the values are set by the Display X,Y, and Z Label controls.

properties.name: Display X Label
properties.desc: The Display X Label allows the user to choose whether to place the Labels for the X axis at the min or max extent. This is disabled when a user has set the Center Coordinates.

properties.name: Display Y Label
properties.desc: The Display Y Label allows the user to choose whether to place the Labels for the Y axis at the min or max extent. This is disabled when a user has set the Center Coordinates.

properties.name: Display Z Label
properties.desc: The Display Z Label allows the user to choose whether to place the Labels for the Z axis at the min or max extent. This is disabled when a user has set the Center Coordinates.

properties.name: Label Origin Method
properties.desc: The Label Origin Method determines how the origin is set for labeling axes.The Application Origin option is intended for fences projected to 2D. Custom allows you to define your own origin for labels.

properties.name: Label Origin
properties.desc: Axes Origin lets you change the labelling (e.g. to make axes with labels starting at zero in x, y and z lined up to local origin).

properties.name: Interval Reference Point
properties.desc: The Interval Reference Point is used when Set Interval is selected.  This control allows the user to set the origin point for the grid lines.

properties.name: Interval Spacing
properties.desc: The Interval Spacing is used when Set Interval is selected.  This control allows the user to set the spacing between each grid line for the X, Y, and Z axis.

properties.name: Minor To Major Intervals
properties.desc: The Minor To Major Intervals control is used to determine how many minor intervals for every major interval.

properties.name: Max Intervals
properties.desc: The Max Intervals will limit the number of intervals created when the Set Interval toggle is selected.

properties.name: Draw Box
properties.desc: The Draw Box toggle is used to specify if the axes should be drawn as a box around the data domain or as single X, Y, and Z lines.

properties.name: Draw Ticks
properties.desc: The Draw Ticks toggle is used to specify if the ticks should be drawn along the axes.

properties.name: Box Line Width
properties.desc: Box Line Width determines the thickness of the box lines. 0 (and 1) give a single pixel wide line and larger numbers give wider lines. Note that only odd numbers 1, 3, 5, etc. are supported by the Software Renderer.

properties.name: Display Major
properties.desc: The Display Major toggle is used to specify whether the tick marks and labels are displayed.

properties.name: Display Minor
properties.desc: The Display Minor toggle is used to specify whether the tick marks and labels are displayed.

properties.name: Major Gridline Style
properties.desc: The Major Gridline Style controls the way the Major Gridline is displayed.

properties.name: Minor Gridline Style
properties.desc: The Minor Grid line Style controls the way the Minor Grid line is displayed.

properties.name: Major Line Width
properties.desc: The Major Line Width control allows the user to set the width of the Major Grid line width in pixels. Note that only odd numbers 1, 3, 5, etc. are supported by the Software Renderer.

properties.name: Minor Line Width
properties.desc: The Minor Line Width control allows the user to set the width of the Minor Grid line width in pixels. Note that only odd numbers 1, 3, 5, etc. are supported by the Software Renderer.

properties.name: Display XY Grid At Min
properties.desc: The Display XY Grid At Min toggle will determine whether grid lines are displayed at the XY Grid minimum extents.

properties.name: Display XY Grid At Max
properties.desc: The Display XY Grid At Max toggle will determine whether grid lines are displayed at the XY Grid maximum extents.

properties.name: Display XZ Grid At Min
properties.desc: The Display XZ Grid At Min toggle will determine whether grid lines are displayed at the XZ Grid minimum extents.

properties.name: Display XZ Grid At Max
properties.desc: The Display XZ Grid At Max toggle will determine whether grid lines are displayed at the XZ Grid maximum extents.

properties.name: Display YZ Grid At Min
properties.desc: The Display YZ Grid At Min toggle will determine whether grid lines are displayed at the YZ Grid minimum extents.

properties.name: Display YZ Grid At Max
properties.desc: The Display YZ Grid At Max toggle will determine whether grid lines are displayed at the YZ Grid maximum extents.

properties.name: Display Axes
properties.desc: The Display Axes toggle will turn on or off the visibility of all axes.

properties.name: Axes Color
properties.desc: The Axes Color allows the user to set the color for all axes.

properties.name: Label Type
properties.desc: The Label Type allows the user to select between three font types. Forward Facing Fonts will always be aligned to the View.  TrueType fonts are standard fonts.  Line fonts are low impact fonts which perform better when large numbers of labels are generated.

properties.name: TrueType Font Style
properties.desc: The TrueType Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: Line Font Style
properties.desc: The Line Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: Forward Facing Style
properties.desc: Forward Facing Style allows the user to align the labels to an appropriate view and to alter the basic layout of the font.

properties.name: Title Height Factor
properties.desc: The Title Height value allows the user to set the height for the title on each axis as a percentage of the Tick Label Height.

properties.name: Title Offset
properties.desc: The Title Offset is a distance to offset the Name from the corner of the axes box. This value affects all axes.

properties.name: Tick Label Height
properties.desc: The Tick Label Height value allows the user to set the height for the tick labels on each axis as a percentage of the total axes extent.

properties.name: Tick Label Precision
properties.desc: The Tick Label Precision is an integer slider that determines how the tick positions (numeric values) will be determined. For values of zero and larger it determines the number of decimal points. If this number is negative, the function attempts to automatically determine the optimal number of decimal points to use based on the value. By changing this negative value, you can control the number of decimal points used in the automatic conversion for all axes.

properties.name: Tick Scale
properties.desc: The Tick Scale affects the relative size of the Tick marks and the label offsetting for all axes.

properties.name: Tick Label Offset
properties.desc: Tick Label Offset is a distance to offset the Tick label from the end of the tick mark. This value will be set for all axes.

properties.name: Show Labels
properties.desc: The Show Labels toggle will turn on or off the labels for all axes.

properties.name: Automatic Text Placement
properties.desc: Automatic Text Placement automatically handles the label options based on centering options selected. This toggle does not affect Forward Facing Font styles.

properties.name: Display Axis
properties.desc: The Display Axis will allow the user to turn on or off the visibility of the axis.

properties.name: Axis Color
properties.desc: The Axis Color allows the user to set the color for the entire axis and the labels for that axis.

properties.name: Title Name
properties.desc: The TitleName allows the user to set the label for the axis.

properties.name: Title Offset
properties.desc: The Title Offset is a distance to offset the TitleName from the corner of the axes box.

properties.name: Tick Label Precision
properties.desc: Tick Label Precision is an integer slider that determines how the tick labels will be determined. For values of zero and larger it determines the number of decimal points. If this number is negative, the function attempts to automatically determine the optimal number of decimal points to use based on the value. By changing this negative value, you can control the number of decimal points used in the automatic conversion.

properties.name: Tick Label Offset
properties.desc: Tick Label Offset is a distance to offset the Tick label from the end of the tick mark.

properties.name: Show Labels
properties.desc: The Show Labels toggle will allow the user to turn on or off the labels along the axis.

properties.name: 3D Label Settings
properties.desc: 3D Label Settings allow the user to align the labels to an appropriate view.  This is disabled when Automatic Text Placement is on.

properties.name: Display Axis
properties.desc: The Display Axis will allow the user to turn on or off the visibility of the axis.

properties.name: 3D Label Settings
properties.desc: 3D Label Settings allow the user to align the labels to an appropriate view.   This is disabled when Automatic Text Placement is on.

By changing this negative value, you can control the number of decimal points used in the automatic conversion.
